ms2100_arch.c

Go to the documentation of this file.
00001 /* PNI ms2100 connected on SPI1 */
00002 /*
00003   IMU b2
00004   SS on P1.28
00005   RESET on P1.19
00006   DRDY on P0.30 ( EINT3)
00007 */
00008 
00009 #include "peripherals/ms2100.h"
00010 
00011 volatile uint8_t ms2100_cur_axe;
00012 
00013 static void EXTINT_ISR(void) __attribute__((naked));
00014 
00015 void ms2100_arch_init( void ) {
00016 
00017   ms2100_cur_axe = 0;
00018 
00019   /* configure SS pin */
00020   Ms2001Unselect();                       /* pin idles high */
00021   SetBit(MS2100_SS_IODIR, MS2100_SS_PIN); /* pin is output  */
00022 
00023   /* configure RESET pin */
00024   Ms2001Reset();                                /* pin idles low  */
00025   SetBit(MS2100_RESET_IODIR, MS2100_RESET_PIN); /* pin is output  */
00026 
00027   /* configure DRDY pin */
00028   /* connected pin to EXINT */
00029   MS2100_DRDY_PINSEL |= MS2100_DRDY_PINSEL_VAL << MS2100_DRDY_PINSEL_BIT;
00030   SetBit(EXTMODE, MS2100_DRDY_EINT); /* EINT is edge trigered */
00031   SetBit(EXTPOLAR,MS2100_DRDY_EINT); /* EINT is trigered on rising edge */
00032   SetBit(EXTINT,MS2100_DRDY_EINT);   /* clear pending EINT */
00033 
00034   /* initialize interrupt vector */
00035   VICIntSelect &= ~VIC_BIT( MS2100_DRDY_VIC_IT );                       /* select EINT as IRQ source */
00036   VICIntEnable = VIC_BIT( MS2100_DRDY_VIC_IT );                         /* enable it                 */
00037   _VIC_CNTL(MS2100_DRDY_VIC_SLOT) = VIC_ENABLE | MS2100_DRDY_VIC_IT;
00038   _VIC_ADDR(MS2100_DRDY_VIC_SLOT) = (uint32_t)EXTINT_ISR;         // address of the ISR
00039 
00040 }
00041 
00042 void EXTINT_ISR(void) {
00043   ISR_ENTRY();
00044   /* no, we won't do anything asynchronously, so just notify */
00045   ms2100_status = MS2100_GOT_EOC;
00046   /* clear EINT */
00047   EXTINT = (1<<MS2100_DRDY_EINT);
00048   VICVectAddr = 0x00000000;    /* clear this interrupt from the VIC */
00049   ISR_EXIT();
00050 }
